    • Uses of OperatorState in org.apache.flink.streaming.state

      Subclasses of OperatorState in org.apache.flink.streaming.state 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GraphState
      GraphState represents a special MapState for storing graph structures.
      class  MapState<K,V>
      A Map that can be used as a partitionable operator state, for both fault tolerance and rebalancing in Flink programs.
      class  PartitionableState<T>
      Base class for representing operator states that can be repartitioned for state state and load balancing.
      class  SimpleState<T>
      Basic OperatorState for storing and updating simple objects.
